did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Tompkins County (N.Y.) marriage and death notices, 1820-1870.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Alphabetical records of approximately 3,500 marriages performed and approximately 1,600 deaths occurring in Tompkins County; data taken from local newspapers and typed on 3x5 cards.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Alphabetical records of approximately 3,500 marriages performed and approximately 1,600 deaths occurring in Tompkins County; data taken from local newspapers and typed on 3x5 cards.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Tompkins County (N.Y.) Marriage and Death Notices. #2283. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Cards filed under wife's maiden name.
